materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi, or Sacred Bo Tree, in Anaradhapura, Sri Lanka. There is a fence on the upper terrace of the structure, in front of the tree. Near the center-left of the photograph, there is a woman covered in all black, standing by a pillar. At the bottom of the photograph, there is the remains of the upper torso of a seated Buddha statue. The word 'LAWTON' is handwritten on the photograph on the right. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Sacred Bo Tree, Anaradjapoora, Ceylon
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Anuradhapura (Sri Lanka) Buddhism Bodhi Tree
